title: Unknown Direct X Error with Graphics card drivers
body:
Unable to enter any league games, even bot custom games due to an Unknown error with my DirectX and I guess my graphics card drivers. Both are up to date so any info would be appreciated! ):

Graphics Card: NVidia GeForce GTX 750 Ti
Windows 10

replies.body: This could also be a problem with settings or drivers with your OS, and not necessarily your graphics driver.  As a first step, I recommend making sure your Windows is up to date in addition to your drivers.  Go over each step in our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to make sure that your PC is tuned up for League.  Hopefully, this steps there will get this all fixed up.
Thanks I will try all of these methods, hopefully something works. @_@
